summary: Adds two followers to the game
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds to followers they are replicas of my and my friends characters
Used mods Temptress race mod and Apachi skyhair

Back story, Thanatos: Thanatos is half Bosmer half Redguard his Father was Redguard and his Mother Bosmer, he was always tough and rather aggressive, he had a "normal life" working as a mercenary and exploring around Tamriel, all was well for him until the day he got word from his mother, he quickly returned to his home in Falkreath to find his Mother she told him how his father had been acting very strangely like going out at night but when his mother asked for him at the Inn he had never been there so one night Thanatos followed his father to find him talking to a Vampire Thanatos heard nothing of what was said but he new it was nothing good, his father soon left and then Thanatos confronted the Vampire and forced him to tell him what he was doing with his father and he found that he had become corrupted by the vampire and was his thrall Thanatos killed the vampire and searched for away to cure his father who was still aimlessly trying to serve his dead master, until the day his father went insane and attacked Thanatos and poisoned his mother Thanatos slew his own father and watched his mother die in his arms he mourns for both of them in the Falkreath graveyard, and he has a new found hatred for vampires.

Requirements and location:
Apachii skyhair female is required in order to use Zeux and Apachi sky hair is required for Thanatos
I recommend amazing follower tweaks for Thanatos otherwise he isn't available as a follower
Thanatos is found in the Falkreath graveyard
Zeux is found in the Bannered mere in Whiterun.

INSTALLATION
Option 1. Press add mod from file in nexus mod manager find the downloaded zip file then presto activate and you should have it.

Option 2. Download then open zip file then copy the esp's into your skyrim data folder where all the other mods are.
Load order: I'm sorry i have no idea just place after required mods.
author: Zeuth
